main event: A witness reported seeing a balloon-like object with a light over Syracuse, Indiana on August 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 10 minutes.
The object was described as a 'solid balloon-like' object.
The witness was unable to make an evaluation of the object.
The report notes there was 'very little information' provided.
The witness was an aeronautical inspector.
sighted object: a balloon-like object with a light
photographs: yes, the report indicates photographs were taken
